#define SAMPLE_SIZE(SampleFormat)   (SampleFormat >> 16)
 Return the size (in memory) of one sample (bytes).
#define SAMPLE_SIZE_DISK(SampleFormat)
 Return the size on disk of one uncompressed sample (bytes).
